author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower glass tip for curbless showers…never drill through curbless shower waterproofing to anchor shower glass u-channel. That’s a sure fire way to create water leaks. I use Schluter DECO-SG and bond it to the floor using mortar and KERDI-FIX. This installation is strong and works great for curbless showers. Many thanks to Schluter for providing the DECO-SG for my client’s custom shower 👍🏽🔥#curblessshower #showerremodel #bathroomremodel #schlutersystems #brandpartner
title: Shower Glass Tip for Curbless Showers - #shorts #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
